radiographic_examinations.findings: A very large mass posterior to the left lobe of the thyroid, with substernal extension and displacement of the trachea.
Marked reduction in bone mass at all sites, with T-scores in the osteoporotic range at the lumbar spine and distal radius.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: BMD increased dramatically by 51% at the lumbar spine, 36% at the total hip, and 11% at the distal forearm within the first year after surgery.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: X-rays of the clavicles and hands
radiographic_examinations.findings: No evidence of osteitis fibrosa cystica.
